properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 13 at 8:34PM CST by NWS Mobile AL
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a Flood Warning for the
following rivers in Alabama...

Bayou Sara At Saraland affecting Mobile County.

.Recent heavy rainfall will result in rising river levels at Bayou Sara through
early next week. The Bayou Sara at Saraland is forecast to rise above flood stage
by next Tuesday evening, with additional rises possible thereafter.  A Flood
Warning is now in effect.

The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a

* Flood Warning for
The Bayou Sara At Saraland
* From Tuesday evening until further notice
* Flood stage is 4.0 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by Tuesday evening. Additional rises will
be possible thereafter.
* At 4.0 feet...Flooding of streets begins.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...
Stay tuned to developments by listening to NOAA Weather radio.
